gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਦੇਖੇ ਦ੍ਰਿਸਟਿ ਕੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਸਬਦ ਕੈ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Pooran Braham Daykhay Drisati Kai , Gurmukhi Sabad Kai Pooran Braham Hai ?
translation: An obedient Sikh of the Guru sees the Lord pervading everywhere. By his utterances and expressions, he shows His presence to others as well.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਸ੍ਰੁਤਿ ਸ੍ਵਨ ਕੈ ਮਧੁਰ ਬਚਨ ਕਹਿ ਬੇਨਤੀ ਬਿਸਮ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Pooran Braham Srouti Sravan Kai , Madhur Bachan Kahi Baynatee Bisam Hai ?
translation: Guru's obedient slave hears the melodious sound of the complete God with his own ears by his very sweetly spoken words. He makes supplications which have marvellous sweetness in them.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਰਸ ਗੰਧ ਸੰਧਿ ਪ੍ਰੇਸ ਰਸ ਚੰਦਨ ਸੁਗੰਧ ਗਮਾਗਮ ਹੈ
transliteration: Gurmukhi Pooran Braham Ras Gandh Sandhi , Prays Ras Chandan Sougandh Gamaagam Hai ?
translation: Guru-conscious person always relishes the elixir of Lord's name even if he is lured by the combined attractions of his sense of smell and taste. The wondrous elixir obtained as a result of his love for the Lord is far more fragrant than the Sandalwood.

gurmukhi: ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਗੁਰ ਸਰਬ ਮੈ ਗੁਰਮੁਖਿ ਪੂਰਨ ਬ੍ਹਮ ਨਮੋ ਨਮ ਹੈ ॥੧੫੨॥
transliteration: Gurmukhi Pooran Braham Gur Sarab Mai , Gurmukhi Pooran Braham Namo Nam Hai ?152?
translation: Guru-oriented person considers the True Guru as a form of all-pervading Lord God. He makes his salutations and supplications to him again and again. (152)
